output_items.cn: a）充电机发送CCS报文，同时停止电力输出，并10ms的周期发送CST报文，报文格式、内容和周期GB/T 27930—2015中9.3和10.3.9的要求，报文长度4个字节。
output_items.en: A) The charger sends CCS message, stops power output at the same time, and sends CST message at a cycle of 10 ms. The message format, content and cycle are in accordance with the requirements of 9.3 and 10.3.9 in GB/T 27930 — 2015, and the message length is 4 bytes.

output_items.cn: b）充电机发送CCS报文，同时停止电力输出，并10 ms的周期发送CST报文，报文格式、内容和周期GB/T 27930—2015中9.3和10.3.9的要求，报文长度4个字节。

output_items.cn: 1）充电机 暂停输出电流，测试系统和充电机按充电流程正常通信；
output_items.en: 1) The charger suspends the output current, and the test system and the charger communicate normally according to the charging process;

output_items.cn: 2）等待时间10 min内，接收到测试系统中报文SPN3090—SPN3095均为00（电池状态正常），且SPN3096为01（允许充电）时，充电机恢复充电且冲击电流满足GB/T 18487.1—2015中9.7要求；
output_items.en: 2) When SPN3090 — SPN3095 is 00 (battery status is normal) and SPN3096 is 01 (charging is allowed) in the test system within 10 minutes, the charger recovers charging and the impact current meets the requirements of 9.7 in GB/T 18487. 1 — 2015;

output_items.cn: 3）等待时间ms，充电机中止充电，按10 ms的周期发送CST报文，报文格式、内容和周期
output_items.en: 3) Wait for ms, the charger will stop charging and send CST message according to the cycle of 10 ms, message format, content and cycle

output_items.cn: a）充电机接收到BST报文，发送CCS报文，10 ms的周期发送CST报文，报文格式、内容和周期GB/T 27930—2015中9.3和10.3.9的要求，报文长度4个字节，同时停止电力输出。
output_items.en: A) The charger receives the BST message, sends the CCS message, and sends the CST message at a cycle of 10 ms. The format, content and cycle of the message are in accordance with the requirements of 9.3 and 10.3.9 in GB/T 27930 — 2015. The length of the message is 4 bytes, and the power output is stopped.

output_items.cn: b）充电机接收到BST报文，发送CCS报文，10 ms的周期发送CST报文，报文格式、内容和周期GB/T 27930—2015中9.3和10.3.9的要求，报文长度4个字节，同时停止电力输出。
output_items.en: B) After receiving the BST message, the charger sends CCS message and CST message at the cycle of 10 ms, with the format, content and cycle of the message as required in 9.3 and 10.3.9 of GB/T 27930 — 2015. The length of the message is 4 bytes, and the power output is stopped.

output_items.en: 1) When the CRO message of SPN2830 = 0 xAA is sent for the first time, the message shall be sent at a cycle of 250 ms by the charger, and the format, content and cycle of the message shall meet the requirements of 9.2 and 10.2.5 in GBT 27930 — 2015;

output_items.cn: 2）超过ms，充电机发送SPN3924=01的CEM报文，报文格式、内容和周期GBT 27930—2015中9.5和10.5.2的要求。
output_items.en: 2) When ms is exceeded, the charger sends SPN3924 = 01 CEM message, and the format, content and period of the message are in accordance with the requirements of 9.5 and 10.5.2 in GBT 27930 — 2015.

output_items.en: 1) Since the first CST message is sent, the ms charger shall send the CST message at a cycle of 10 ms, and the format, content and cycle of the message shall meet the requirements of 9.3 and 10.3.9 in GBT 27930 — 2015;

output_items.cn: 2）超过ms充电机发送SPN3927=01的CEM报文，报文格式、内容和周期GBT 27930—2015中9.5和10.5.2的要求。
output_items.en: 2) Exceed the requirements of 9.5 and 10.5.2 in the format, content and period of the CEM message of SPN3927 = 01 sent by the ms charger in GBT 27930 — 2015.
